programme.title: Glastonbury 2024 - EP 2
programme.desc: Chris Martin’s band make musical history by headlining at the Pyramid Stage a record-breaking five times. Grammy award-winning singer Dua Lipa also graces the Pyramid Stage - seven years after her festival debut - while country-pop crossover singer Shania Twain follows in the footsteps of Diana Ross, Dolly Parton and Kylie Minogue by taking the coveted Sunday afternoon ‘legend’ slot.

programme.title: Celebrity Lingo S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Celebrity Lingo is a spin-off from the fast-paced daytime word game Lingo. Celebrity Lingo is hosted by RuPaul Charles, Famous twosomes will work against the clock as they try to figure out where the letters go in a series of words... but it's not as easy as it might sound. The celebs will also be hoping to guess enough words correctly in order to win money for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Dirty Home Rescue - EP 1
programme.desc: Cleaning expert Hayley Leitch and her team of professional cleaners answer SOS calls from Britain's filthiest houses while identifying unhealthy habits which cause mess.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Toys - EP 2
programme.desc: Adam's not playing around, he's working hard to find out how some toys transform from mere playthings into valuable collectibles, nostalgic beacons of our childhood and thus classics. Adam visits Stern to see how their pinball machines have outlasted the competition and even the law! Plus, how have Slinkys kept springing back? How was the Rubik's Cube invented? How does Lionel trains keep chugging and how does Hasbro get that amazing smell into its can of Play-Doh?

programme.title: Planet Action S4 - EP 3
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

Sloppy has a lot of wishes, so he makes a giant lantern. Unfortunately, his lantern carries more than just his wishes up into the sky --- their entire house with it too!

programme.title: On The Red Dot - EP 31
programme.desc: Since 2022, Roger Tan has written over 28,000 letters to inmates. Now living with terminal cancer, he hopes to build a legal charity to support inmates and ex-offenders rebuilding their lives. During COVID-19, hawker Melvin Chew set up Hawkers United Dabao to help thousands of non-tech-savvy hawkers. Even as his own stall struggled, he keeps fighting for hawkers who needed support.

programme.title: Le Bisellahause - EP 3
programme.desc: While at a viewing, Mikey sees Slick Rick, a rival agent, selling a property just a couple of doors down. Through a bit of spying, Mikey discovers that it's actually a front for vice activities! Mikey has two options - he can keep things quiet so as not to scare off his own client or he can do the right thing and call the police. But sneaky Mikey goes with option 3 blackmail! Will he succeed in his diabolical scheme?

programme.title: Kumar Vs The World - EP 3
programme.desc: Swipe right or swipe wrong? Kumar dives headfirst into the chaotic world of modern love - dating apps, ghosting, situationships, red flags and a whole lot more. Are dating apps killing romance? All this and much more on Kumar VS_x000D_Modern Dating!

programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1 - EP 7

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure - EP 3
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 429
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day - EP 3
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

programme.title: The Librarians: The Next Chapter - EP 1
programme.desc: A Librarian -- a custodian of a magical repository of the world's most powerful and dangerous supernatural artifacts -- from the past travels to the present and finds himself unable to return to his own time. When he returns to his castle, which is now a museum, he inadvertently releases magic across the continent. In order to set things right, he is given a new team of Librarians to help him clean up the mess he made.

programme.title: La Brea S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: When their plan to infiltrate the Building goes awry, Gavin finds himself face-to-face with its enigmatic leader. Eve, Levi, Sam and Izzy are forced to rely on a former adversary to lead a rescue attempt. In 1988, Josh and Riley enjoy some fun before a startling turn.

programme.desc: Jie Yu sees Hong Bo to counsel him but gets held hostage instead. Hong Bo wants to see Le Lin, so that he can die with her.

programme.title: Unriddle 2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Zhengyi gets kidnapped and Xiaoman rushes to the old building to look for her. She sees Big Small Eye being hung to death but is unable to do anything.

programme.title: Poetic Justice - EP 1
programme.desc: The plot revolves around a group of young professionals involved in investigative journalism. Two journalists team up with a wealthy businessman and a lawyer to help solve cases for those in need. As they investigate further, they uncover more secrets and dark truths behind some of the crimes.

programme.desc: The plot revolves around a group of young professionals involved in investigative journalism. programme.title: Mrs P.I. - EP 1
programme.desc: An ex-policewoman and 2 housewives living in the same neighbourhood suspect their neighbour’s suicide is more than meets the eye. Their curiosity gets the better of them and together they solve the murder case. The three of them, Dai Xiu Mei (Michelle Chong), Yun Fei Xue (Cynthia Koh) and Qiu Shuang Xi (Apple Hong) decide to start a private investigative agency to serve the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Mrs P.I. - EP 2

programme.title: Deluxe-licious - EP 8
programme.desc: It is no longer a luxury to have a delicious meal with quality ingredients - instead, people are opting for extravagance, high price points, and rarity. There are many cuisines and ingredients that are known to everyone by their jaw-dropping price tags, but the chance to taste them are exclusive to the richest among us. Just how luxurious exactly are these ingredients for them to warrant such high prices?

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 258
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Frontline - EP 33
programme.desc: Cardiovascular disease is a leading cause of death in Singapore, with heart attacks projected to triple by 2050. This Frontline episode examines how minimally invasive procedures improve heart care and why more women are affected, with 1 in 3 female deaths linked to heart disease. Once weighing 28kg and struggling with anorexia, this duathlete now sets her sights on the SEA Games.

programme.title: Under The Net - EP 17
programme.desc: Yun Lin tries to make training fun and help her team overcome their weaknesses. She starts having mood swings. A dejected An Qi doesn’t make the starting lineup. An Qi and Yun Lin’s teams face off in the inter-school match. Yun Lin’s team loses despite their best efforts. Her perseverance wins her a scout’s attention and a chance to audition for the national team. She faints enroute to the trial.

programme.title: Talk of the Town - EP 106
programme.desc: A half-hour talk-show segment in Hello Singapore which brings together diverse voices and expert opinions to thought-provoking discussions on wide range of issues. Incorporating online polls which gather public opinions, the segment creates a space that allows for multi viewpoints in the studio from Monday to Friday.

programme.title: Teresa Teng - EP 84
programme.desc: Teresa Teng, deeply missing Wang Zhongwen, is found innocent but banned from Japan for a year and decides to continue her U.S. concerts. Meanwhile, Duan Ning’s efforts to care for Taisheng move him to propose, leaving her in tears of joy.

programme.title: Focus - EP 29
programme.desc: This year saw a record number of newly elected female heads of state and government worldwide, but the path to power for women has never been smooth. Singapore also saw a record number of female MPs in its new term. How do Singaporean female politicians find their place? Nanyang Hakka Federation actively recruits and cultivates female talent, enabling more people to contribute to society.

programme.title: Taste of Life - EP 928
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change.

But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 21
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Jadi Bos Jangan Galak Galak, Gak Bahaya Ta?
programme.desc: A police officer named Ferdi (Andrew Andika) who was driving his car, was suddenly almost hit by a motorbike driven by a reckless woman named Mirna (Anjani Dina). Finally the police officer reprimanded him, Mirna said that she was in a hurry. One day they met again at Ferdi's house. Long story short, Ferdi already had a girlfriend, but her girlfriend turned out to be fierce to Ferdi's son, Rafa, even to the point of slapping him. Finally, Mirna helped Rafa and was loved by him.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 41
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Visi Misi Cinta Pagar Bagus
programme.desc: Galih (Cemal Faruk), a photographer, immediately falls in love with make-up artist Audi (Yiriska Patricia). Galih immediately sets out on a mission to win Audi's heart.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 495
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 21
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Aku Butuh Ayang Walau Tuhan Maha Penyayang
programme.desc: Naya takes care of a man named Leo (Rizky Fachrel) who can't walk due to an accident during illegal motorcycle racing. Leo's mother said that Leo is an introverted child and has no friends. She asked Naya to be comfortable taking care of Leo. Naya told Leo's mother that she would take care of and help Leo until Leo could recover. Naya diligently takes care of Leo, helping him during physiotherapy. Unexpectedly, Leo likes Naya.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 41
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Senyum Neng Yang Bikin Gula Cepet Abis
programme.desc: It is said that Fahri (Erdin Werdrayana) has just returned from traveling to the city. He wants to meet his girlfriend Tiara in the village. However, it turns out that Tiara is engaged to a handsome, rich man, and the girl even said that her future husband will soon become the village head. Then from there, Fahri, who feels hurt and resentful because he has been betrayed, becomes obsessed with becoming the village head. Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 495
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KAPAN NIKAH? VS DOAIN AJA
programme.desc: Jana (Glenca Chysara) and Jeni (Ina Marika) are two sisters with different personalities. Jana is a tomboy and works as a car mechanic. Meanwhile, Jeni is a girl who likes to dress up, hang out, and is feminine. The two swap bodies after being electrocuted. Meanwhile, Rafi (Fendy Chow) is Jeni's boyfriend. There is turmoil of love and feelings between the two sisters.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 22
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KAU CURI PACARKU, KURETAKAN CINTAMU
programme.desc: Nadin (Rachquel Nesia), who doesn't want her parents to arrange a marriage for her, is advised by her housekeeper to find a fake boyfriend. The man is Jaki (Ridho Ilahi), whom Nadin has met before. They are very surprised, but they must continue their mission.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 42
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: KEBUN Teh LOVE STORY
programme.desc: Joni has been dressed up because today is his wedding day. Joni is going to marry Teti, the village head's daughter. Joni is forced to marry Teti, because Teti is ugly, fussy, and spoiled. Basically, it would be really funny if he was near her.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 43
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Mau Keren Malah Jualan Es Legen
programme.desc: A man named Aden (Masaji Wjayanto) is a seller of ice legen which always sells well. Suddenly, a woman, Azizah (Callista Arum), approaches him. Not wanting to buy ice, but the woman has another intention, namely changing the brand of ice legen to Es Ronald as ordered by her boss, Ronald. She even disguised herself so she could find out the recipe and secret of the ice legen that Aden sold. However, her disguise was blown by Daniel. Azizah was angry and confused about what else to do.

programme.title: Jihan Show S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa - EP 4
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Nostalgia kehidupan di kampung dirakamkan dalam siri animasi Kampung Boy dengan pelbagai watak yang menarik disulami dengan pelbagai peristiwa lucu dan menghiburkan.

programme.title: Sape Terer - EP 4
programme.desc: Sape Terer merupakan 'game show' terbaharu yang mempertemukan artis otai dan artis baharu bersaing merebut gelaran juara setiap episod.

programme.title: Awak Suka Saya Tak? - EP 2
programme.desc: Intan mencintai Hilman Yong, Sejak kemalangan berlaku Hilman hilang menjadi Damien Yong. Kini Intan terpaksa menyayangi bekas suaminya dari jauh dan menunggu Hilman kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Meja Bulat Sepahtu - EP 2
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara santai yang di hos kan oleh Sepahtu dengan pelbagai topik menarik dan terkini.

programme.title: Potong - EP 2
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang pemuda Midun, yang kini menyambung legasi perkhidmatan berkhatan tradisional peninggalan arwah bapanya, seorang Tok Mudim handal di kampung.

programme.title: Lawak Sorang - Sorang - EP 11
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan " Stand Up Comedy " gabungan antara Malaysia dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Dapur Chef Ammar - EP 8
programme.desc: Saksikan kehebatan dan kepakaran Chef Ammar dalam menyediakan pelbagai hidangan masakan dan makanan ala Arab yang lazat lagi penuh berkhasiat ini.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam - EP 10
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 9
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Mimi Mencari Cinta - EP 9
programme.desc: Kisah Mimi seorang gadis yang cantik menawan bekerja di sebuah pasaraya ingin segera mencari pasangan hidup walaupun terpaksa buntu memilih di antara dua orang adik-beradik.

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 1
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 10
programme.desc: Joras & Stars ialah sketsa yang menampilkan Naib Juara MLM 2016 bersama artis jemputan setiap minggu untuk menghiburkan penonton melalui sketsa yang kelakar.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 11
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Opah Popular - EP 11
programme.desc: Badrul dan Sofia bertugas di luar negara dan menghabiskan cuti dengan balik ke kampung. Anaknya mereka dipaksa untuk tinggal bersama opah.

programme.title: Tabung Lawak 2 - EP 21
programme.desc: Tabung Lawak ialah pelbagai klip video pendek untuk menekankan topik-topik hangat dalam cara yang lucu.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 21
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Ting Tong… Love
programme.desc: Bosan dengan desakan ibunya untuk berkahwin, Hairi akhirnya bersetuju dengan syarat dia boleh memilih jodohnya sendiri. Adakah calon pilihan Hairi menepati citarasa ibunya?

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 1
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Chinraasu, a compassionate villager loved by the whole village, and Thulasi, a cheerful young girl, are siblings who can go to any lengths for each other. Follow this unique story about the bonds shared by Chinraasu and Thulasi as they stand by each other while finding love and joy in the trials of life.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: La Reine Soleil
programme.desc: Ancient Egypt, 18th dynasty. The fiery Princess Akhesa, 14, rebels against her father, Pharaoh Akhenaten. She refuses to live confined within the walls of the royal palace and runs away with the help of Prince Tut to find her mother, Queen Nefertiti, who has been exiled on Elephantine Island...

programme.title: La Charge Mentale
programme.desc: In the village, word has it that Denis and Celine have a little marital problem. Feeling his virility has been attacked, Denis decides to put his name down for a wife-carrying race in the hope of regaining esteem and respect.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 21
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 34
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 51
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 15
programme.desc: Still in the parallel world, Pokou and Boni take refuge in a clearing but during the night they hear strange noises. Pokou sets off in search of Boni who seems to have disappeared.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 16
programme.desc: A monstrous creature has imprisoned Boni! Pokou will need all her courage and self-control to free her friend.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 6
programme.desc: In Guadeloupe, Mr Barbin is a maker of Ka drums. The instrument is fundamental to gwoka, a music genre handed down by the Africans deported to the West Indies that has become a veritable expression of local culture.

programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: La Bouteille
programme.desc: A jogger speeds across fields burnt by the sun. He throws his finished bottle of water into nature. The bottle immediately comes back to him, interrupting his run.
November 2030. It's 48°C in the classroom. Impossible to do any teaching.

programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 4
programme.desc: Christian welcomes actor Marc-Andre Grondin, writer Chrystine Brouillet, and chef Jean-Michel Leblond to cook foods considered 'unappetizing.' From offal to snails, they explore unusual flavors.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 13
programme.desc: In Zurich, we visit a house built in 1909. After many an adventure, it finally escaped destruction and is now home to a Hindu community. Martin Jenni is a gastronomic journalist. He lives in a former restaurant, transformed into a very selective inn!

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 14
programme.desc: Discover the ecrins massif in the Hautes-Alpes. In this jewel of the mountains, known to be one of the coldest in France, ice climbing is a popular activity.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 19
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 22
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 35
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 52
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 17
programme.desc: In a new village, Pokou and Boni try to help the women and children who have been left on their own. The men have been turned to stone by a wicked wizard.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 18
programme.desc: Pokou and Boni decide to try to help the stone wizard who, because of his unhappiness, has poured all his sadness and anger onto the men of the village. As a result of their kindness they are able to collect the final magical sphere.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 7
programme.desc: Gwoka is the beating heart of Guadeloupe. Mr Barbin, who makes traditional the Ka drums so essential to the musical genre, hopes to develop the heritage and pass his know-how on to his apprentice Anthony.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Caroline Cherie
programme.desc: France, 1789. The Revolution is brewing. In order to ensure the safety of his daughter Caroline, the Comte de Bievres marries her to the sinister lawyer Georges Berthier, future member of the Convention. But the young woman understands nothing of politics and her heart belongs to another, Gaston de Sallanches.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: Mboa, Matanda, Le Tournoi Des Rois
programme.desc: Within the city of Mboa Matanda, the Crab and Cayman districts have been doing battle for centuries. Tasked with restoring peace, General Dibombe organises a wrestling tournament between the champions of the different districts. But then he finds himself facing General Essoka, the man who had murdered his family.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 3
programme.desc: Delpierre and Romain use a scientific study to demonstrate how dangerous the pesticides that they want banned really are. Conducted by a team led by Merienne, it proves that using Lymitrol, Saskia's flagship product, can have a catastrophic impact on health. Bowman tries to dissuade Villeneuve from going to trial.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 4
programme.desc: Delpierre's wife is offered a grant by a prestigious foundation, but its connections to Saskia risk compromising the MP's integrity. Meanwhile, Chloe is trying to understand the meaning of the documents her father sent her before his death.

programme.desc: Christian organizations claim to rescue children from human trafficking and abuse. But some of these rescue missions endanger the minors.

They hope more people will train to become running guides - so that sport becomes open to all.

programme.title: Movie - Bagheera
programme.desc: Building on his aversion to women, Bagheera, a hitman, creates a dubious application in order to kill women at anyone's request.

programme.title: Movie - Thadaiyara Thaaka
programme.desc: A young man dreams of making a fortune in Chennai; he owns a travel agency and is all set to marry his lover. After he crosses paths with a loan shark, the latter is killed mysteriously. The young man runs for cover and plans to find the murderer.

programme.title: Movie - Sooriya Nagaram
programme.desc: Lovers belonging to two different communities face opposition from the girl's father, who is the head of his community. Initially, her brother supports her, but eventually he changes.

programme.title: Movie - Thaai Naadu
programme.desc: Thaai Naadu is a 1997 Indian Tamil film directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by S. Shankar. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, B. Saroja Devi, Srikanya and Geethanjali in the lead roles. The film had a musical score by Rajan-Nagendra.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kungumapottu Gounder
programme.desc: Kandasamy is desperate to enroll his son in a good school. Problems arise when his wife spots him with an educated woman who is posing as their child's mother in order to help the kid gain admission.

programme.title: Movie - Annai (New)
programme.desc: Maha, a rich widow, lets Anjali, a young orphan, live in her house for a month every year. Problems arise when Anjali criticises Maha's behaviour.

programme.title: Movie - Pagal Nilavu
programme.desc: Selvam is indebted to Devarajan, a big shot in town, for saving his mother. When he falls in love with the sister of the new police inspector, Devarajan plans to make good use of the situation.

programme.title: Movie - Rojavanam
programme.desc: Muthu, an orphan, works at an old age home and loves Roja, the daughter of the owner. But she is in a dilemma as she has to marry the son of her father's friend to save the home.

programme.title: Movie - Padikkathavan (Old)
programme.desc: Two brothers are ousted from their house by their stepbrother's wife. Years later, when one of the brothers is framed for a murder, his stepbrother, who is a judge, returns as a lawyer to save him.

programme.title: Movie - Adhe Neram Adhe Idam
programme.desc: Kartik and Janani love each other, but Kartik's father insists that he should get settled financially before moving forward. Kartik goes to Australia for a year and befriends Siva, who happens to be engaged to Janani.

programme.title: Movie - Yarukku Theriyum
programme.desc: Seven people regain consciousness and find themselves in a warehouse. Unfortunately, they do not remember how they got there.

programme.title: Movie - A Film By Aravind
programme.desc: Director Aravind and actor Rishi go on a road trip to find inspiration for their next film. However, they turn into real-life characters as a script dictates the events in their lives.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Nandinee
programme.desc: A young girl suspects her single mother of being in a relationship with Rangaswamy, their paying guest. Things take a turn when she decides to confront Rangaswamy.

programme.title: Movie - Vasantha Ragam
programme.desc: Vasantha Raagam is a romantic drama film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar. The cast includes Vijayakanth, Rahman, Sudha Chandran and S. A. Chandrasekhar. S. A. Chandrasekhar's son Vijay plays a child artist in this film.

programme.title: Movie - Uyarntha Ullam
programme.desc: Anand, a wealthy man, spends his time in drinking, gambling and entertaining his friends. When he meets Geetha, a young woman, he is smitten by her and decides to mend his ways.

programme.title: Movie - Ranga
programme.desc: Ranga, who was once a nice man, plans to kidnap a young boy while Raju, a former crook, decides to protect him. However, things change when their shared past is revealed.

programme.title: Movie - Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu 2
programme.desc: Saravanan despises his father, a bus driver, who gets suspended from work due to his passion for Kabaddi. However, Saravanan's life changes when he learns the truth about his father's identity.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 4
programme.desc: Premier League Moments sits down with one of the most stylish players ever to grace the English top flight. programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Everton (MW16) - EP 151
programme.desc: Chelsea are winless in their last three Premier League matches (D2 L1), having won five of their previous six games (L1). The Blues’ only longer winless run under Enzo Maresca came in December and January last season (five games).

programme.title: Burnley vs Fulham (MW16) - EP 153
programme.desc: Burnley are unbeaten in their last 29 home league games against Fulham, their longest ever run against an opponent at Turf Moor. Their last defeat was in April 1951.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football’s most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Aston Villa (MW16) - EP 158
programme.desc: West Ham are winless in their last five Premier League games against Aston Villa (D3 L2), having won five in a row against them before that.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW16) - EP 156
programme.desc: Only Crystal Palace have won more Premier League away games (5) and points (16) than Tottenham this season (4 wins, 14 points), while Spurs are also the only side to have scored in all of their games on the road so far this term.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Newcastle United (MW16) - EP 157
programme.desc: Sunderland are unbeaten in their last nine league games against Newcastle (W6 D3), with this the first such Tyne/Wear derby since a 1-1 draw at St James’ Park in March 2016.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Manchester City (MW16) - EP 155
programme.desc: Crystal Palace are winless in their last 10 Premier League home games against Man City (D3 L7) since a 2-1 victory under Alan Pardew in April 2015.

programme.title: Brentford vs Leeds United (MW16) - EP 159
programme.desc: Leeds have lost their last nine Premier League games in London, with their last victory coming at Brentford in May 2022. It’s their second longest losing run in the capital in the top-flight, after a 12-game streak between March 1925 and September 1930.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Aston Villa (MW16) - EP 158
programme.desc: West Ham are winless in their last five Premier League games against Aston Villa (D3 L2), having won five in a row against them before that.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26 - EP 9
programme.desc: Kevin Phillips remembers the unforgettable 1999/00 season, when he took the Premier League by storm with 30 goals for Sunderland - a tally that made him the top scorer in European football that campaign.

programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Linland
programme.desc: This week's edition features BODOGFIGHT: Clash of the Nations, taking place from the ICE Palace in St. Petersburg, Russia. The event is headlined by MMA legend Fedor Emelianenko (25-1) taking on UFC Veteran Matt Lindland (20-4). The fight features two of the world's top-ranked fighters in the world, with Emelianenko being considered the sport's top pound-for-pound fighter at the time, and Lindland being an Olympic Greco-Roman Wrestling silver medalist.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The final group of 18 competitors advances beyond Stage 1 to face even greater challenges. Will anyone progress all the way to Stage 4 for the first time?

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Timothy Bradley vs. Luis Carlos Abregu
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a bout between 2 undefeated fighters, Timothy 'Desert Storm' Bradley (25-0, 11 KOs) vs. Luis Carlos Abregu, aka 'El Potro' (29-0, 23 KOs) from the Agua Caliente Casino, Rancho Mirage in California, USA on July 17, 2010.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

This episode features a bout between 2 undefeated fighters, Timothy 'Desert Storm' Bradley (25-0, 11 KOs) vs. Luis Carlos Abregu, aka 'El Potro' (29-0, 23 KOs) from the Agua Caliente Casino, Rancho Mirage in California, USA on July 17, 2010.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.desc: Rubble & Crew help Lucas make the most awesome Science Fair volcano ever. But will Wingsy get in the way of the eruption?

programme.title: DORA S1 - EP 106
programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 - EP 812
programme.desc: When Axle City's letters to Santa go undelivered, Blaze and Sparkle set out on an epic adventure to the North Pole to deliver them themselves! But can they make it to Santa before Christmas?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 126
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 - EP 1114
programme.desc: At a Christmas Eve sleepover the Jr. Patrollers are fooled into helping Mayor Humdinger steal everyone's stockings so he can get all the presents.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 - EP 717
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 29
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 30
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector - the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: The Paladins face the most epic battle yet

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 27
programme.desc: Ty, Revvit and the crew save a band of Woodland Reptools from an evil and destructive Sawmetradon named Splitter who refuses to join the Trux team.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 69

Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip’s Music Store!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat’s sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don’t go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: It’s Pandy’s birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it’s even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it’s time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat’s Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 35
programme.desc: The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 36
programme.desc: A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 70
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 71
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 72
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 22

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Palisa Anderson visits two Byron Bay chefs, Ben Devlin and Jason Saxby to explore the idea of combining traditional cooking methods with the use of the local ingredients.

programme.title: The Streets with Dan Hong S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Dan Hong sets out to unearth iconic national street food dishes, tracing them back to their roots and then preparing them himself.

programme.title: The Chef's Garden S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Chef Massimo Mele heads out to sea in search of the highly prized South Rock Lobster. Bringing this culinary journey to a delightful close, Massimo ends on a sweet note with two family favourites: panna cotta and zeppole.

programme.title: Muster Dogs: Collies and Kelpies S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: As the puppies settle into their new homes and the five-month assessment approaches, the six handlers find themselves struggling to navigate personal challenges and training hurdles.

programme.title: Dreaming Big S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Dreaming Big is a documentary about gifted Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander youths on the cusp of becoming Australia's next generation of sports stars.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the series return for 2025, we look at the next wave of emerging Pasifika talent at the ACT Brumbies. We also chat with hopeful future superstars of the NFL on the Gold Coast. (Return)

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 249
programme.desc: 12 people killed and 29 injured in a terrorist attack at Bondi Beach. James Glenday is at Bondi in Sydney with the latest plus Bridget Brennan, Emma Rebellato and Nate Byrne with the day's news, sport, interviews and weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 249
programme.desc: 15 victims and one of the gunmen killed in a terrorist attack at Bondi Beach. Gemma Veness and Jeremy Fernandez bring you the latest details plus today's top stories and all the news you need this morning.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 249
programme.desc: 15 victims and one of the gunmen killed in a terrorist attack at Bondi Beach. Melissa Mackay and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you special coverage with the latest details plus today's top stories and all the news you need today.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Aboriginal school kids sing to a proud Derek in their shared Noongar language before he heads out to pick avacado, learns about native finger limes and gets Mark some more of his favourite olive oil.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Considered a tough nut to crack, Thanh explores how chestnuts are grown, cooked, and enjoyed. From shaking a chestnut trees to demonstrating some of the best ways to cook this winter delight.

programme.title: Pasin Wantok S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Formed in 1967 in Morobe, Langema String Band was a successful musical group that blended contemporary and traditional melodies.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: February 1, 1981: Australia vs NZ at the MCG. With New Zealand's tail-end batsman needing 6 runs to win off a single ball, Australian skipper Greg Chappell made a decision that is still being talked about over 40 years later.

programme.title: Restoration Australia S7 - EP 5

programme.title: Camel Capers S1 - EP 1

programme.desc: We're turning up the heat! Buddy visits two iconic hotspots who are famous for their intensely spicy dishes. First, he heads to Jitlada to see if he can withstand the heat of their Thai Jungle Curry.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6) - EP 88
programme.desc: Dolmar receives a tip on a home in the Palm River, so he and Amanda head over to scope it out. Even though the home has suspect additions and termite damage, Dolmar feels the deal is too good to pass on.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays - EP 1
programme.desc: Gather around the table and prepare to give thanks! Rachael shows how to make a tender and crispy smoked turkey, seasoned with herbs and spices and served with chestnut and sausage stuffing.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2) - EP 58
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to cook hot honey chicken, a simple and enjoyable dish made with seasoned chicken thighs, which she serves with charred corn on the cob.

programme.title: Robin Roberts Presents I Will Survive: The Gloria Gaynor Story

programme.title: The Venice Murders
programme.desc: Leaving her career behind, Celia follows her passion to Italy but faces crisis when her roommate vanishes. Alone, she joins eccentric Aunt Rosato to rescue her friend and unmask the abductor.

programme.title: The Killer Inside: The Ruth Finley Story
programme.desc: Ruth and her husband Ed's tranquil life in Wichita, Kansas is suddenly turned upside down when Ed suffers a heart attack. While Ed is in the hospital, Ruth's starts to receive mysterious threats.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: We celebrate the nation's emerging athletic talent, from the Olympic 4 × 400 meters relay team's record-breaking performance to Ross Branch's trailblazing achievements in the Dakar Rally and young tennis sensation Malak Macheng's rise. programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: World-renowned abstract artist Julie Mehretu has garnered international recognition for her depictions of the urban experience through her larger-than-life artwork. Her pieces are housed in some of the world's most prestigious art institutions, including the Smithsonian in Washington, D.C., and the British Museum in London. Following in the footsteps of those who paved the way for her success, Mehretu is now helping other creatives thrive.

programme.title: Connecting Africa

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Americas Now

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Special Drama "Mary of Magdalene Restaurant" Part 2 (R)
programme.desc: Oikawa Shimon, a chef who has lost everything, drifts into Tsukihate, an imaginary town where those on the brink of life mysteriously gather. There he finds Magdala-ya, a tiny diner on a cliff run by Ria Arima-a mysterious woman with a scar on the neck. Through Ria’s cooking and her unconditional kindness, Shimon begins to reclaim the courage to live. Based on Harada Maha’s novel, this moving drama explores sin, redemption, and the irreplaceable value of life.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!
